#summary Overview.

= Dependencies =

  * jquery.core 
  * jquery.ui.core.js
  * jquery.ui.widget.js


= Overview =

Make the selected element a Google map.

{{{
$(document).ready(function() {				
    $('#map_canvas').map();
});
}}}

= API =

==Constructor==

|| *Constructor* || *Description* || 
|| gmap(panel:string, opts?:[Overview#MapOptions]) || Creates a new map inside of the given div panel. || 

==Methods==

|| *Methods* || *Return Value* || *Description* ||
|| getCurrentPosition(successCallback?:function(position), errorCallback?:function(error), notSupportedCallback?:function, opts?:[Overview#GeoLocationOptions] || none || Obtain the current location of the device and invoke the appropriate callback. ||
|| watchPosition(successCallback?:function, errorCallback?:function, notSupportedCallback?:function, opts?:[Overview#GeoLocationOptions] || none || Monitor the position of the device and invoke the appropriate callback every time this position changes. The monitoring will continue until the clearWatches method is called. ||
|| sidebar(panel:string, position:ControlPosition) || none || Creates a control from the given div panel on the map. See [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#ControlPosition ControlPosition] for control positions. ||
|| addMarker(opts?:[Overview#MarkerOptions], callback?:function(map, marker)) || none || Creates a marker on the map. ||
|| addInfoWindow(marker:Marker, opts?:[Overview#InfoWindowOptions]) || none || Creates an info window bound to the marker on the map. ||
|| loadJSON(url:string, data?:string, callback?:function(iterator, marker)) || none || Adds markers to the map through a JSON request. The JSON format must be (["markers":[]]). ||
|| loadHTML(type:string, class:string, callback?:function(markerOpts, node)) || none || Adds markers to the map by looking for sementic attributes in the selected classes. Semantic types currently supported: 'rdfa', 'microformat' and 'microdata'. ||
|| loadDirections(panel:string, origin:string(or LatLng), destination:string(or LatLng), travelMode:[Overview#TravelMode]) || none || Displays directions on the map and/or in a div panel. ||
|| loadStreetViewPanorama(panel:string, opts?:[Overview#StreetViewPanoramaOptions]) || none || Displays the panorama for a given LatLng or panorama ID. ||
|| search(request:[Overview#GeocoderRequest], successCallback:function(Array.GeocoderResult), errorCallback:function(GeocoderStatus)) || none || Search addresses and latitude/longitude. ||
|| clearMarkers() || none || Clears all markers on the map. ||
|| clearWatches() || none || Clears all monitoring positions. ||
|| destroy() || none || Removes the map functionality. ||

===MapOptions===
====Properties====

Supports all Google Maps [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#MapOptions MapOption] properties

|| *Properties* || *Type* || *Description* ||
|| callback || function || A callback routine invoked after the map has been loaded. Optional. ||

All properties in the [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#MapOptions MapOption] object can be set and retrieved by

{{{
//getter
var language = $('#map_canvas').gmap('option', 'language');
//setter
$('#map_canvas').gmap('option', 'language', 'sv');
}}}
